name: Greystones Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Greystones would put to shame many 4* wanabee hotels, including some 5! The hosts are amazingly nice and helpful people, the room has every detail you can dream of in a palace, the breakfast is one of the best I have ever had and the views from the room facing the sea is really cool.
reviews.title: First Class B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Next time Marie and I go to Mevagissey for a week end trip, we know where we are staying :-)
reviews.title: Recent trip to Greystones Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: Myself and my daughter whos nearly 3 ,visited Greystones in August 2011 . we were greeted by Valda and Mike who immediately made us feel very welcome in their home .....our room was clean and fresh and modern in design and my daughter was well catered for ( Valda even went to the trouble of providing toys and games for my daughter to play with in our room ) Our cooked breakfast each morning was delicious and Valda couldnt do enough to ensure our stay was relaxed and enjoyable - we will definately be recommending to friends and family
reviews.title: Great Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The house is about 5-10 mins walk uphill from Mevagissey with plenty of street parking. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. Breakfast is served upstairs facing the bay. Would definitely recommend.
reviews.title: Ideal place to stay - first class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we had a very enjoyable four night stay here , you are guaranteed a warm welcome from Valda and Mike and made to feel like friends , our room was spacious and light , very comfortable with lots of storage, spotlessly clean and so quiet . The bathroom was large with fresh towels daily and quality toilitries . Breakfast was a delight and to sit looking out over the bay was glorious. Mevagissey is just a short walk downhill with plenty of bars and restaurents . I am sure anyone staying here will be very happy with their selection .
reviews.title: Absolutely Ideal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a week in Devon and Cornwall and stayed for two nights at Greystones. What a lovely stay it was too! Valda and Mike were so friendly and helpful and made us feel really at home. The room was lovely, so much space with very tasteful decor and gorgeous views over the Bay. The delicious breakfast is served in their actual own lounge upstairs with wonderful views over Mevagissey. We didn't realise at the time of booking that Mevagissey is fairly central for visiting most places, South and North Cornall and we wished we could have stayed longer. If you're thinking of visiting Cornwall then a stay at Greystones is a must! We will certainly be returning as soon as possible!
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent five weeks touring around England and Wales and we both feel 'Greystones' was the best B & B we stayed at during our holiday. Valda and Mike were perfect hosts and we felt like we had been friends for years. The rooms are modern and stylish and spotlessly clean but it was breakfast that was the show stealer. Served upstairs with a magnificent view, breakfast was delicious and filling.
reviews.title: The Best B & B in the UK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Greystones is situated far enough out of the village that parking isn't a problem yet close enough to walk to the village for a meal and night out.
reviews.title: Welcoming and friendly hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Because of the wonderful experience we had at 'Greystones' we know we will return one day.
reviews.title: Home from home with bells on!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Greystones is a handy location for walking in to Mevagissey and for walking the South West Coast path. It has the advantage of parking which isn't readily available in the centre of Mevagissey.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT B & B WITH WONDERFUL VIEWS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was the third time that`ve been here for 16 days. It feels like cominig home again.
reviews.title: Such a lovely place !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed Valda`s perfect service and the lovely breakfast in the morning very much.
reviews.title: Highly Recomended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We say THANK YOU VERY MUCH to Mike and Valda for all these wonderful days
reviews.title: we loved it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: with good talks and a lot of fun.
reviews.title: what can i say,

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will miss you both very much. See you next time.
reviews.title: Excellent B&B, couldn't fault a thing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Clean and friendly with a lovely breakfast. High quality rooms although we didn't get the opportunity to use the hot tub. The perfect place to stay when exploring Mevagissey. Will be back
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Magnificent accomodation. Probably the best B&B we have ever stayed in. Breakfast was varied, a great start to every day. Valda was so accomodating when we had special requests. Mike was a mine of information on things to do. We will certainly return when we are in the area. Ray & Louise.
reviews.title: Valda & Mike are the perfect hosts.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first stay. Great location, fantastic hosts. Definitely not your average b & b, more like a luxury hotel. Very clean, comfortable room with all mod cons - beautiful en suite, flatscreen TV with freeview, comfortable bed, tea and coffee facilities, fridge, even wineglasses and a corkscrew! Lovely breakfasts served in mine hosts' private living room. Valda and Mike are the perfect hosts - we'll certainly go back when we visit Cornwall again.
reviews.title: Great Find!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: WOW, B & B with Style, it certainly was. We were two couples staying for three nights, in that time we were made to feel very welcome, and well looked after. Facilities were excellent, as was the breakfast, and the views were lovely over the bay. Thank you, if we come to this part of Cornwall again we would definitely go back and stay there.
reviews.title: Wow, B & B with style

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reception from our hostess was warm and attentive, and the B+B was immaculate.
reviews.title: Thoroughly recommened for a stay in this area.

aka: Greystones Bed And Breakfast Mevagissey, Cornwall
description: A warm welcome awaits you at Greystones. We have 2 ensuite sea view rooms, one with ensuite shower room and one with ensuite bathroom. We also have a garden facing room which is also ensuite. Our rooms are immaculately clean and have mini fridges, tea/coffee making facilities and tv with free dvds to use for your convenience. Breakfasts are cooked to your liking and we pride ourselves providing breakfasts for guests with special diets.
